name: Building Bits
description:
The Internet has collapsed due to malicious code, and it's up to you to save it! Explore a series of underground Web tunnels and use the power of bits to push you forward. Meet some odd characters who will help you on your way, gain bits to use for more complex puzzles, and dodge the constant rush of glitched objects flying at you!

Controls:

WASD - Moving

Space - Jump

Left Click - Place Bit

Right Click - Retrieve Bit/s

E - Advance Dialogue

(This ended up being a pretty rushed game for the jam that lacks some good presentation, but hopefully you enjoy it nonetheless!)
